Verses: 1 avar Kannerittup Paarththapodhu, Aisuvariyavaangal Kaanikkaip Pettiyile Thangal Kaanikkaigalaip Podugiradhaik Kandaar.
2 oru Ezhai Vidhavai Adhile Irandu Kaasaip Podugiradhaiyum Kandu:
3 indha Ezhai Vidhavai Matrellaaraip Paarkkilum Adhigamaagap Pottaal Endru Meyyaagave Ungalukkuch Sollugiren.
4 avargalellaarum Thangal Paripooranaththilirundheduththuth Dhevanukkendru Kaanikkai Pottaargal; Ivalo Thanvarumaiyilirundhu Than Jeevanaththukku Undaayirundhadhellaam Pottu Vittaal Endraar.
5 pinbu, Sirandha Karkalinaalum Kaanikkaigalinaalum Dhevaalayam Alangarikkappattirukkiradhaik Kuriththuch Silar Sonnabodhu,
6 avar: Neengal Paarkkira Ivaigalil Oru Kal Matroru Kallinmeliraadhapadikku Ellaam Idikkappadum Naatkal Varum Endraar.
7 avargal Avarai Nokki: Podhagare, Ivaigal Eppozhudhu Sambavikkum, Ivaigal Sambavikkum Kaalaththukku Adaiyaalam Enna Endru Kettaargal.

8 adharku Avar: Neengal Vanjikkappadaadhapadikku Echcharikkaiyaayirungal, Enenil Anegar Vandhu En Naamaththaith Thariththukkondu: Naandhaan Kirisdhu Endrum, Kaalam Sameebiththadhu Endrum Solluvaargal; Avargalaip Pinbatraadhirungal.
9 yuththangalaiyum Kalagangalaiyung Kuriththu Neengal Kelvippadumbodhu, Bayappadaadhirungal; Ivaigal Munnadhaagach Sambavikkavendiyadhe; Aanaalum Mudivu Udane Varaadhu Endraar.
10 appozhudhu Avar Avargalai Nokki: Janaththukku Virodhamaai Janamum, Raajyaththukku Virodhamaai Raajyamum Ezhumbum.
11 pala Idangalil Magaa Boomiyadhirchchigalum, Panjangalum, Kollai Noigalum Undaagum; Vaanaththilirundhu Bayangaramaana Thotrangalum Periya Adaiyaalangalum Undaagum.

12 ivaigalellaam Nadappadharku Munne En Naamaththinimiththam, Avargal Ungalaip Pidiththu, Jebaaalayangalukkum Siraichchaalaigalukkum Oppukkoduththu, Raajaakkal Munbaagavum Adhibadhigal Munbaagavum Ungalai Izhuththuth Thunbappaduththuvaargal.
13 aanaalum Adhu Ungalukkuch Saatchiyaavadharku Edhuvaayirukkum.
14 aagaiyaal Enna Uththaravusolluvomendru Kavalaippadaadhirukkumbadi Ungal Manadhile Nirnayampannikkollungal.
15 ungalai Virodhikkiravargal Oruvarum Edhirpesavum Edhirnirkavum Koodaadha Vaakkaiyum Gnaanaththaiyum Naan Ungalukkuk Koduppen.
16 petraaraalum, Sagodhararaalum, Bandhujanangalaalum, Sinegidharaalum Kaattikkodukkappaduveergal; Ungalil Silaraik Kolaiseyvaargal.
17 en Naamaththinimiththam Ellaaraalum Pagaikkappaduveergal.
18 aanaalum Ungal Thalaimayiril Ondraagilum Azhiyaadhu.
19 ungal Porumaiyinaal Ungal Aaththumaakkalaik Kaaththukkollungal.
20 erusalem Senaigalaal Soozhappattiruppadhai Neengal Kaanumpodhu, Adhin Azhivu Sameebamaayitrendru Ariyungal.
21 appozhudhu Yoodheyaavilirukkiravargal Malaigalukku Odippogavum, Erusalemilirukkiravargal Veliye Purappadavum, Naattuppurangalilirukkiravargal Nagaraththil Piravesiyaamalirukkavum Kadavargal.
22 ezhudhiyirukkira Yaavum Niraiverumpadi Needhiyaich Sarikkattum Naatkal Avaigale.
23 annaatkalil Karppavadhigalukkum Paalkodukkiravargalukkum Aiyo, Boomiyinmel Migundha Idukkanum Indha Janaththinmel Kobaakkinaiyum Undaagum.
24 pattayakkarukkinaale Vizhuvaargal, Sagala Purajaadhigalukkullum Siraippattuppovaargal; Purajaadhiyaarin Kaalam Niraiverum Varaikkum Erusalem Purajaadhiyaaraal Midhikkappadum.
25 sooriyanilum Sandhiranilum Natchaththirangalilum Adaiyaalangal Thondrum; Boomiyinmelulla Janangalukkuth Thaththalippum Idukkanum Undaagum; Samuththiramum Alaigalum Muzhakkamaayirukkum.
26 vaanaththin Saththuvangal Asaikkappadum; Aadhalaal Boomiyinmel Varum Aabaththugalukkup Bayandhu Edhirpaarththirukkiradhinaal Manusharudaiya Irudhayam Sorndhupom.
27 appozhudhu Manushakumaaran Migundha Vallamaiyodum Magimaiyodum Megaththinmel Varugiradhaik Kaanbaargal.
28 ivaigal Sambavikkath Thodangumpodhu, Ungal Meetpu Sameebamaayiruppadhaal, Neengal Nimirndhu Paarththu, Ungal Thalaigalai Uyarththungal Endraar.
29 andriyum Avargalukku Oru Uvamaiyaich Sonnaar: Aththimaraththaiyum Matrellaa Marangalaiyum Paarungal.
30 avaigal Thalirkkiradhai Neengal Kaanumpodhu Vasandhakaalam Sameebamaayitrendru Arikireergal.
31 appadiye Ivaigal Sambavikkiradhai Neengal Kaanumpodhu, Dhevanudaiya Raajyam Sameebamaayitrendru Ariyungal.
32 ivaiyellaam Sambavikkum Mun Indhach Sandhadhi Ozhindhupogaadhendru Meyyaagave Ungalukkuch Sollugiren.
33 vaanamum Boomiyum Ozhindhupom, En Vaarththaigalo Ozhindhu Povadhillai.

34 ungal Irudhayangal Perundhindiyinaalum Veriyinaalum Lavugeega Kavalaigalinaalum Baaramadaiyaadhapadikkum, Neengal Ninaiyaadha Neraththil Andha Naal Ungalmel Varaadhabadikkum Echcharikkaiyaayirungal.
35 boomiyilengum Kudiyirukkira Anaivarmelum Adhu Oru Kanniyaippola Varum.
36 aagaiyaal Inich Sambavikkappogira Ivaigalukkellaam Neengal Thappi, Manushakumaaranukku Munbaaga Nirkap Paaththiravaangalaaga Ennappaduvadharku, Eppozhudhum Jebampanni Vizhiththirungal Endraar.
37 avar Pagarkaalangalil Dhevaalayaththile Ubadhesampannik Kondirundhu Raakkaalangalil Veliye Poi, Olivamalai Ennappatta Malaiyile Thangivandhaar.
38 janangalellaarum Avarudaiya Ubadhesaththaik Ketkumpadi Adhigaalame Dhevaalayaththil Avaridaththirku Varuvaargal.
